data.system_settings: Macbook Air (Early 2015), macOS Sierra 10.12.6, Firefox Quantum 57.0.4 (64-bit)
data.actual_result: It displays a weird gray section with the scroll bar, and it's also too spaced out.
data.expected_result: It's supposed to show a scroll bar
data.short_description: Weird/too spaced out scroll bar section when adding a role to a person in Firefox browser
data.steps_to_repro: - Have many roles in a server - Click on someone and click the "+" to add roles - Observe the scroll bar
